Pre-Game Insights: David Peterson did most of the pitching with 3.0 clean frames, one hit and three walks in the Division Round opener.
Luis Severino went 11-7 with a 3.91 ERA in 31 starts and 2-4 with a 5.07 ERA in 12 postseason games.
Zack Wheeler finished with 7.0 innings, one hit, four walks and nine Ks in a great outing in the Division Series.
Christopher Sanchez logged a 3.32 ERA with an 11-9 record in 31 starts and has just one postseason start.
The Mets won their Wild Card series with victories 8-4 Tuesday and 4-2 Thursday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets were able to eke into the playoffs with a Wild Card bid this year, posting an 89-73 overall record.
Philadelphia won the National League East this year with a 95-67 overall record, earning a bye into the Division Series.
Others: The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Phillies' last three home games.
Each of the Phillies' last six games against National League opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Eleven of the Mets' last 14 playoff games have gone OVER the total runs line.
